p:
The results show a rise in the noise levels at the three stations through the whole day timing than the permissible noise limits. At ROS the equivalent noise level is higher than the equivalent permissible noise level L
DEN (52.6 dB) with 22.18 dB and in SGS is higher by 22.36 dB also in CLS is higher with 23.19 dB on working day and with 21.94 dB on the weekend.
